front.title: DNS SRV Usage Guidelines and Owner Name Recommendations

abstract.t: The DNS SRV record has been specified in RFC 2052 and RFC 2782 foruse in dynamic service discovery for a domain. These two RFCs didnot clearly specify an IANA registry for the names of the servicesand their underlying protocols. This document clarifies RFC 2782regarding the formation and use of the Service Prefix in the ownername of SRV records, based on the unified IANA "Service Name andTransport Protocol Port Number" registry and provides a few othercorrections, clarifications, and usage recommendations.
